page.title: 03RECREATION
page.content: Local Recreation. The major centre for leisure and recreation is in the nearby town of Ashford. However, there are a variety of local activities which occur. Cricket is the main summer activity in the local villages.Warehorne has its own cricket field where matches take place on Sundays.Football takes over in the winter, matches being played on Saturdays. To the north of our area is Hempstead Forest which is a combined nature trail for walkers and a picnic site. There are many local footpaths in the area and part ot the Saxon Shoreway Footpath passes through the south of our area.
